ovdesc.p: This application will be used to process the pay-out of a structure note instrument.
The pay-out can be in cash or in the form of the underlying security.
The pay-out price will be automatically updated if a pay-out routine is specified for the instrument or SUB.ASSET.TYPE.
The pay-out details including the coupon rate, amount, the underlying along with ratio details for conversion can be also be manually input in this application.

t.p: The id of the record will be in the format Instrument*Event*Date.
Instrument - should be an valid STRUCTURE.NOTES instrument.
Event - should be one of the following three events .
Date - should be a valid date.
